title.narrative: OUTPUT 7.3: PROGRAMME PLANNING & MONITORING

description.narrative: Programme Planning monitoring, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral - Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral - Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses (Covid), Cross-Sectoral - Planning And Programme Reviews, Cross-Sectoral - Planning And Programme Reviews (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2024, the country programme is efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet standards in achieving results for children
